settings.title: Can Ulike IPL cause cancer?
settings.answer: Our handsets ensure that all UV wavelengths are filtered out, blocking wavelengths below 1200nm from the IPL spectrum. This is the standard for most IPL systems. This is done to prevent the light from causing damage to the outer layers of the skin. Therefore, our IPL handset is not cancer-causing and you can use it without worry.

settings.title: Is Ulike IPL Hair Remover safe, and will it cause skin disease?
settings.answer:
We have conducted many clinical trials on IPL’s safety and effectiveness, and because of this, IPL has become a widely used hair removal method in clinics and households.
If you follow the instructions, our handset will not bring any harm to you. Ulike guarantees that all UV lights have been filtered away from the IPL’s light spectrum, including all wavelengths below 1200 nanometres. This industry standard applies to most IPL systems and is done to prevent skin damage by the light rays, which means that you will never experience chronic complications such as skin disease and skin aging.

settings.title: Who wouldn't recommend this product?
settings.answer:
The Ulike IPL hair removal device is not recommended if you have any of the following:
- A known skin disorder
- Skin diseases such as allergic dermatitis, eczema, etc.
- Photosensitive epilepsy or Photosensitivity
- Are menstruating, pregnant, or lactating
- Dark black or Sunburnt skin (please refer to the skin tone chart)
- Broken skin, a scab or healed wound, cancer or hemangioma
- Any artificial aesthetic, prosthetic, or plastic area
- Tattoo area

settings.title: Can I use IPL hair removal over scars and tattoos?
settings.answer: We don’t recommend using IPL over scars or tattoos because it causes heat-build and pain in these areas. However, it is acceptable to use IPL to treat areas around tattoos.

settings.title: Can I use IPL during pregnancy or breastfeeding?
settings.answer: Though there is no evidence that IPL negatively impacts pregnancy and breastfeeding, we don’t recommend using IPL during these times to prevent any potentialities.

settings.title: Can I travel with Ulike product?
settings.answer: Don't let your travel plans get in the way of your smooth skin. All of our products contain no battery and are in a light compact design so you can continue to do what you love more wherever you go.

settings.title: How to use the remover?
settings.answer:
Step 1: Clean the treatment area, and use a razor to shave off the hair in need of care. Make sure your skin is compleletly dry before applying the device.

Step 2: Connect the power cord to the adapter, and insert the plug into a power outlet.

Step 3: Short press the On-Off button on the side of the host to turn on the device.
The product has five intensity levels, press ON/OFF to adjust the intensity level, the higher the level, the greater the energy, the faster the effect. At first, it is suggested to start from level 1, and it can be gradually strengthened to the desired effect.

Step 4: Goggle up to protect your eyes.

Step 5: Place the light outlet on the skin to be treated and apply it vertically.

The hair removal sensor light will light up to indicate that it is fully in contact. Press the flash button to start the hair removal process. If the white light is not turned on, it means that the lamp head is not completely attached to the skin, and the instrument will not emit light.

Step 6: After hair removal is complete, press and hold the On-Off button for 1 to 2 seconds to turn off the device (never pull the plug without turning off the machine to avoid damage).

settings.title: Do I need to shave before using IPL?
settings.answer: Yes, we recommend that you shave the treatment area before using your handset. Shaving the hair to the appropriate length will help IPL effectively focus on the hair follicles.

settings.title: How frequent should I use this product?
settings.answer:
For Air+ Dark Green and Air+ White:

  • Month 1: Use 3 times a week
  • Month 2-3: Use 2 times a week
  • After Month 3: Use once every half or one month.

For Air 3 Purple and Air 3 White:

  • Week 1-2: Treat every other day
  • Week 3-4: Treat twice per week
  • After the initial treatment phase (12 weekly treatments), treat the target area to maintain results once a month, or as required.

settings.title: What come with the IPL hair removal handset?
settings.answer:
1. Hair Removal Device
2. Charging base & cable
3. Safety goggle
4. Razor
5. Product Description Booklet
6. User Manual

settings.title: Are there any side effect?
settings.answer: The biggest advantage of IPL hair removal technology is its zero side effects on skin and body.

settings.title: Does IPL hair remover hurt?
settings.answer: Ulike is the only company that adapts Sapphire Ice-Cooling patent technology to provide pain-free treatments. Users will feel no pain during the treatment.

settings.title: Which areas of the body can I use this on?
settings.answer:
You can use your handset on any part of your body, including your Brazilian (Bikini area) and face. But please do not use around the eyes (use only below cheekbones)

Our IPL is not suitable for the ‘inner parts of the bikini area. Therefore you should never use it on the labia minora, vagina, scrotum, or anus.

To prevent discomfort, we advise you to treat the bikini area, inner thighs, and buttocks from the lowest intensity level, as the skin in these areas can be more sensitive.

settings.title: What is the age range suited for IPL Hair Removal?
settings.answer: We would generally recommend the age range for IPL-use to be 15 and above, and this is because body hair becomes mature at this age. Some follicles mature at a younger age. Therefore whether or not to use IPL will depend on the user. We recommend anyone under 18 gain approval from their parents or have consulted a specialist (cosmetician or dermatologist) before using our products.

settings.title: How do I track my order status?
settings.answer:
1. You can log in our website with your email and track your order status in "My orders" if you placed the order under your registered account.
2. If the order was placed without signing in, Please click here and enter your Order Number and Email Address to see your order details.
3. We will send you a tracking number to your email once the package has been shipped. You can use this number to track your package.

settings.title: Can I cancel/make changes to the order I just placed?
settings.answer: It is only possible to make a change to your order within 2 hours of placing it and if the order has not been processed. We process orders very quickly, so changes and cancellations cannot always be fulfilled. You must immediately contact our Customer Care team (within 2hours) at uk.support@ulikeglobal.com with your change/cancellation request details included.

settings.title: How long will it take for my order to arrive?
settings.answer:
We are just as excited as you are to receive your new product. Shipping times can vary and we work very closely with our carriers to ensure you receive your order as soon as possible. Please allow 1-2 business days for your order to process at our warehouse before shipping. Orders that are shipped via ground shipping typically arrive in 5-8 business days while orders shipped via expedited shipping will arrive in about 1-2 business days.

*Please note that carrier processing can impact these time frames.

settings.title: What shipping methods do you offer?
settings.answer:
STANDARD SHIPPING:

Orders shipped via Standard Shipping are typically shipped within 1-2 business days and arrive in 5 to 8 business days. Estimated delivery dates will be shown to you at checkout.

Note: For International Shipping (the addresses out of the United Kingdom), typically, the shipping will take 8-20 days on delivery.

EXPRESS SHIPPING:

Express Shipping is a flat rate of 7.99 GBP. All Express Shipping orders confirmed before 8 AM BST will be processed and shipped the same day. Orders placed after 8 AM BST will be processed and shipped the following business day. Orders placed on Friday after 8 AM BST will be shipped on the following Monday (excluding holidays). Estimated delivery dates will be shown to you at checkout.

Please note: Original shipping fees are non-refundable.

settings.title: Where do you ship to?
settings.answer:
Ulike ships internationaly. However only the areas below can enjoy free standard shipping.

Free Standard Shipping Areas: Europe, North America, Asia and Australia.

For countries not on the list above, customers are responsible for the shipping cost and duties, please contact uk.support@ulikeglobal.com to verify the total cost.

settings.title: Duties & Taxes
settings.answer: Local taxes and import duties may incur in some countries and are not included in the amounts shown. The buyer or recipient of the shipment is responsible for all such taxes and duties. Our products are sold worldwide and we cannot guarantee that they meet the import requirements of every country. If in doubt, please check with your country's customs office prior to ordering.

settings.title: Can I change my shipping address?
settings.answer:
You can only change the shipping address before your order ships. You can contact us at uk.support@ulikeglobal.com to send the correct shipping address. Our representatives will help you to correct the address.
Once your order has been shipped, we cannot change the delivery address nor delivery options. Customers will be responsible for the re-shipping cost.

settings.title: My package says delivered, but I didn’t receive it.
settings.answer:
Your package will most likely be delivered within a few days, but it’s good to check with your neighbours and/or post office for more information in the meantime!
If you do not receive your order in a couple days, please email our Customer Service team within 14 days of the last tracking update, with your order number and tracking information so we can investigate this for you.

settings.title: What are the payment options available?
settings.answer: Ulike accepts Paypal, MasterCard, Visa, JCP and American Express, ect.

settings.title: Who are your authorized retailers?
settings.answer:
Amazon

Boots

Lotte

Walmart

Don't see a retailer in question? Please connect with our Customer Experience team to verify an Authorized Partner.

settings.title: What is your return policy?
settings.answer:
Ulike offers 100-Day Money-Back Guarantee return policy. To ensure swift and hassle-free handling of your request, minimize unforeseen expenses, and responsibly evaluate and recycle returned items, we will apply a return fee of 5 pounds, which we will deduct from your refund which is otherwise due under our 100-Day Money-Back Guarantee.
Please contact uk.support@ulikeglobal.com to start your return process. Any return without Ulike approval or Ulike provided return label will be rejected.
If you receive a defective or damaged product, please notify us at uk.support@ulikeglobal.com and we will gladly send you a new one! If you do not notify us of a defective or damaged product, we will assume the product was not damaged or defective when you received it. If a damaged item is returned without any notification, we will not be able to process the return.

settings.title: How long does it take for me to get my refund?
settings.answer: Once our team receives and inspects your returned product, our accounting team will initiate your refund within 5-10 business days. An email confirmation will be sent to the email address associated with your order, detailing the amount refunded. The way your refund is processed depends on your original payment method.

settings.title: What is your return process?
settings.answer:
1. Contact Us: Contact us and provide your name, order number, the item for exchange or return, photos of the return item, and reasons for your return. Then, we will send you a printable shipping label with instructions. It contains our return address and basic information about your returned order.
2. Print the return label: Pack your return item(s) properly into the original box, and glue the return label we provided outside the box.
3. Take the package to a post office near you: Send item(s) back to us through the local post office. If you are in urgent need of handling the returned parcels, please contact us and provide a tracking number for the returned parcels. Please Note: Due to the high value of our products being sold, please drop off your package at the nearest post office, DO NOT drop off at the post box. Ulike will not be responsible for any post box package lost.
4. We notify you when we get it: We will process your return in 1-3 business days of receipt of the package.
5. Getting your refund: Your refund will be issued into your original payment method soon after we checked your package mets the return standard. Please allowed 10-15 business days for the refund to show up in your bank account(the refund processing time may vary from bank to bank).

settings.title: Price adjustments & exclusions
settings.answer:
We will offer you a price adjustment based on the following conditions:

- Price adjustment can only be made within 7 days of the date of your order's delivery.
- If we can make an adjustment, your price difference will be returned to the original payment method within 7 to 10 business days.
- Clearance and Final Sale merchandises are not eligible for price match adjustment.

settings.title: What is your Warranty Policy?
settings.answer:
Ulike is committed to quality. Each Ulike device is rigorously tested for quality and performance. Our limited, 2-year warranty covers defects in materials and workmanship of your device. The limited warranty begins on the date of purchase and expires two years later.
This limited warranty does not cover damage, defects, or failure caused by abuse or misuse; improper care; impact or insertion of foreign objects; vandalism; improper storage; improper or incorrectly performed maintenance or repair; application of harmful chemicals; fire, or water; abrasives; negligence; failure to follow manufacturer’s instructions; loss of the device; normal wear and tear; alteration; overuse both professional or commercially.

settings.title: What qualifies as a proof of purchase?
settings.answer:
A proof of purchase is anything that states the date of purchase, the product that was purchased and the seller's information.

Examples include:

Sales receipt
Order confirmation email
Sales Invoice
Order Details

settings.title: I am interested to do business with Ulike, How do I contact with someone?
settings.answer: We are always looking for opportunities to connect with you. For all sales inquiries, please contact our Support Team and provide as much information as possible. Your submission will then be sent directly to the appropriate person and they will contact you if this opportunity is of interest!
